price: Así es el castigo de tu Señor, cuando decide azotar a un pueblo opresor los azota con un castigo doloroso y severo;
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَخۡذُ رَبِّكَ إِذَآ أَخَذَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ وَهِيَ ظَٰلِمَةٌۚ إِنَّ أَخۡذَهُۥٓ أَلِيمٞ شَدِيدٌ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika akhdhu rabbika idhā akhadha al-qurā wahiya ẓālimatun inna akhdhahu alīmun shadīdun
